summary: The diff implements REQ-8 partially but is missing the viewport meta tag update. The safe-area-top CSS utility using env(safe-area-inset-top) was added to index.css, and the class was applied to the header element in Header.tsx. However, there is no evidence that viewport-fit=cover was added to the viewport meta tag in index.html.

missing_requirements.requirement: The viewport meta tag in index.html includes viewport-fit=cover to enable safe area insets (add if not already present).
missing_requirements.reason: No modification to index.html is present in the diff. The viewport-fit=cover attribute is required for env(safe-area-inset-top) to return non-zero values on iOS and Android in fullscreen/standalone mode.
